spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Philly Climb Row" has several indicators suggesting a "Flow & Rhythm" spirit. The description "climb in rhythm" and the rhythm-focused format supports this classification, along with the pop music playlist that promotes a rhythmic flow. This justifies a high score of 0.8.

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is also relevant due to the outdoor setting on the water, as depicted in the image, aligning with the natural exploration aspect, scoring a 0.7.

Additionally, with an intensity level of 2 out of 3 and the focus on pressing for more power, there are elements of "High-Energy & Intense". The use of the "sweat" category indicates an energetic element, leading to a moderate score of 0.6.

Other spirits like "Structured & Disciplined" or "Soothing & Restorative" are less applicable as there's no emphasis on technical precision or relaxation.
